resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157041</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157041</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Health</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Strategies:Health</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Strategies:Health D'Écoute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Strategies:Health Escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategies:Health Ascoltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουσμα Strategies:Health</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Strategies:Health Que escucha</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students improve their vocabulary in the health content area, and learn words which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer ihren Wortschatz im Gesundheit Inhalt Bereich 
verbessern, und erlernt Wörter, die sie in hörenden Erfassenübungen
auch antreffen können. Schließt irgendeine Übersetzung zum 
Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où les étudiants anglais 
améliorent leur vocabulaire dans la zone de contenu de santé, et 
apprend les mots qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans des 
exercices d'écoute de compréhension. Inclut une certaine 
traduction à l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
melhorem seu vocabulário na área do índice da saúde, e aprende as 
palavras que podem também encontrar em exercícios escutando da 
compreensão. Inclui alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi migliorano il loro vocabolario nella zona del soddisfare di 
salute ed impara le parole che possono anche incontrare nelle 
esercitazioni ascoltanti di comprensione. Include una certa 
traduzione ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές βελτιώνουν το λεξιλόγιό τους στην περιοχή 
περιεχομένου υγείας, και μαθαίνουν τις λέξεις που μπορούν επίσης
να αντιμετωπίσουν στις ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. 
Περιλαμβάνει κάποια μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde los estudiantes
ingleses mejoran su vocabulario en el área del contenido de la salud,
y aprende las palabras que pueden también encontrar en ejercicios de 
la comprensión que escuchan. Incluye una cierta traducción al 
hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">santé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">saúde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">salute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">salud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
